idea-plugin.name: Git Status Indicator
idea-plugin.description:
Shows two colored indicators in the status bar for Git repository status:
  • First circle (Uncommitted changes): Green = has changes, Gray = clean
  • Second circle (Unpushed commits): Blue = has unpushed commits, Gray = all pushed
Click the indicator to open the Commit window.
